author: Jabeen Waheed For Mailonline
title: Emma Watson attends Beauty And The Beast with hunky costar | Daily Mail Online
text: show ad He's not bad for a BEAST! Emma Watson wears fairytale blue gown complete with train as she looks into the eyes of her handsome co-star Dan Stevens at Beauty And The Beast film launch in London The film, which will be released on March 17, is on track for a $120million box office opening during its first weekend in the USA Published: 18:35 GMT, 23 February 2017 | Updated: 20:30 GMT, 23 February 2017 11 shares
